Rosehill manslaughter: Mananbir Singh sentenced for killing of Jashandeep Singh in South Auckland https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/rosehill-manslaughter-mananbir-singh-sentenced-for-killing-of-jashandeep-singh-in-south-auckland/BD7OKXYLGFB67CVPAIVALZYTQ4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/rosehill-manslaughter-mananbir-singh-sentenced-for-killing-of-jashandeep-singh-in-south-auckland/BD7OKXYLGFB67CVPAIVALZYTQ4/ Craig Kapitan'The scars left behind on our family's heart will remain forever.' Mon, 20 May 2024 04:31:49 +0000 Mananbir Singh appears in the High Court at Auckland for sentencing. Jurors acquitted him of murder earlier this year but found him guilty of the manslaughter of Jashandeep Singh in the South Auckland suburb of Rosehill in May 2022. Photo / Jason Oxenham
